I came here while vacationing in Barcelona on the recommendation of the front desk at my hotel.  This was one of the best meals of my life!  A little pricey for Spain, but 100% worth it!  The host came over to sit with us, asked us about what we wanted, how hungry we were, etc.  There was no "menu," so it felt like we were being catered to.  Everything was delicious.  Would return!
